Building blocks developing kids creativity. Children can acquire strong sense of color, geometrical shapes including 3D forms numbers counts, magnetic polarities & architectural design at early age.
Magnetic tiles inspire children's manipulative ability, imagination and creativity, problem solving, social skills, motor skills.
Non-toxic ABS plastic food grade material is used; Smooth edge of each tile will never hurt baby's little hands.
Fits 3 years old and older kids, a best way for them to explore the world of geometry and architecture.
description: It will bring a lot of joy to your children and you will love it  ● The Magnetic blocks is easy connecting and never repel, which prompts kids to move from constructing two-dimensional to three-dimensional creations. ● This Magnet toys can not only enrich their imagination, but also train their team spirit and attention.You will find that they no longer pestering you, but always play with friends. Creative Educational Construction Stacking Toys The magnetic tiles can create a number of stable shapes.  ● Non-toxic ABS plastic food grade material is used; Smooth edge of each tile will never hurt baby's little hands.  ● Your child can easily start building the basic forms from 2D shapes to 3D models; It's up to your kids imagination to build!
